quote: Write the code as if it will be accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
author: Steve McConnell

quote: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the capabilities of the programmer
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's Laws

quote: Walking on water and developing programs following the TOR is very easy ... if they are frozen
author: I. Berard

quote: Miracles are where they are believed, and the more they believe, the more often they happen.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Act as if you are already happy and you will truly become happier.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Wherever one can live, one can live well.
author: Marcus Aurelius Antonin
